column5: Anyone know a place near mississauga that carrys the Striker Ice hardwater jackets/bibs?  or have a recommendation for a similar 2 piece floater suit that has the ice fisherman in mind?  I can order it online, but i'd perfer to try it on and get the right fit.  my 1 piece floater is too restrictive for my liking.  The venting on the striker suit is what i really like as I drag a pretty big sled and if its a long walk the venting would be nice
